headline: LEYBOLD DUAL CANISTER OIL FILTERING SYSTEM
description: Dual Canister Oil Filtering System     Designed to remove acids and particulates from the lubricating fluid of Leybold mechanical pumps
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Vacuum Pump Accessories
specstable:
Manufacturer Leybold
Model OF 1000
Description Dual Canister Oil Filtering System
Other Information

Gear pump motor: 1/6 HP
Pumping speed: 0.7 gpm @ 1800 rpm
Pressure gauge: 0 to 100 psig
Pump fluid capacity: 3.75 qt
Prepared for hydrocarbon oil
Flexible hoses: 3/8" ID teflon with stainless steel braid
Oil not included.
One Leybold 898504 aluminua oil filter included
One Leybold 989507 particulate oil filter included

Power Requirements 115 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
Width 14.000 in (35.6 cm)
Depth 23.000 in (58.4 cm)
Height 10.000 in (25.4 cm)
Weight 57 lb (26 kg)
